page.title: 07RELIGIONS
page.content:
Frequency of attendance - Pupils were asked how often they visited their religious institutions. (a).Once a week..............21% (b).Once a month..............9% (c).Only for special services.69% (d).Never......................1%
Some of the religious institutions within the D/Block. Watch Tower House(headquarters for Jehovas Witness);St.Vincent's Convent (church,church school,orphanage, convent,Damascus House Conference Centre);The Priory(convent house for elderly nuns);The Church of the Cross and Star(pentecostal-type church based in Nigeria and attended mainly by West Africans);Rosebank(former Quaker meeting house);Chapel inside Inglis Barracks;John Keble Church;St.Paul's Church;Mill Hill Reform Synagogue.
